Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Family
Status: New Series
Network: Nick @ Nite ( USA)
Airs: Sundays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: October 06, 2012
Episode Order: 20

the series follows David Hobbs (Baio) an actor who, after ten years of starring as America's favorite TV dad, becomes a stay-at-home father to honor the deal he made with his soap star wife (Alanna Ubach, Meet the Fockers) so that she may return to the limelight. Mark Curry (Hangin' with Mr. Cooper) also joins the series as David's friend, Marcus. The series is currently in production on the former Happy Days stage in Los Angeles.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32703)
